data.actual_result: The video call doesn't even end, it still going even after disconnecting
data.expected_result: The video call should end properly
data.short_description: If you end a video call from the notification shade on Android, the call won't even end
data.steps_to_repro: - Start a video call - Let the other partner join your video call - Make sure the person is in the DM's and not in an another server - On the android device, exit out of the application (do not close discord) - Then open the notification shader, and then click "Disconnect"
